timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_container
| { { metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/core_usage_time
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/core_usage_time }
    | union
    | rate
    | every 1m
    | align next_older(2m)
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_cores
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/request_cores }
    | union
    | align next_older(2m) }
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| outer_join 0
| div
| top 5
| scale "%"

fetch k8s_container
| { metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/core_usage_time
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/core_usage_time }
| union
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| top 5

fetch k8s_container
| { metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_cores
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/request_cores }
| union
| align next_older(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| top 5

fetch k8s_container
| { { metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_cores
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/request_cores }
    | union
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/core_usage_time
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/core_usage_time }
    | union
    | rate
    | every 1m }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| join
| sub
| top 5

fetch k8s_node
| { { metric kubernetes.io/node/cpu/core_usage_time
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/core_usage_time }
    | union
    | rate
    | every 1m
    | align next_older(2m)
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/node/cpu/total_cores
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/total_cores }
    | union
    | align next_older(2m) }
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| join
| div
| top 5
| scale "%"

{ fetch k8s_node
  | { metric kubernetes.io/node/cpu/total_cores
      | align next_older(2m)
    ; metric kubernetes.io/node/cpu/core_usage_time
      | rate
      | every 1m
      | align next_older(2m) }
  | group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
  | join
  | sub
; fetch k8s_node
  | { metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/total_cores
      | align next_older(2m)
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/core_usage_time
      | rate
      | every 1m
      | align next_older(2m) }
  | group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
  | join
  | sub }
| union
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| top 5

{ fetch k8s_container
  | { metric kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_cores
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/container/cpu/request_cores }
  | union
; fetch k8s_node
  | { metric kubernetes.io/node/cpu/allocatable_cores
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/allocatable_cores }
  | union }
| align next_older(2m)
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| join
| div
| top 5
| scale "%"

fetch k8s_node
| { { metric kubernetes.io/node/cpu/total_cores
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/total_cores }
    | union
    | align next_older(2m)
  ; { metric kubernetes.io/node/cpu/core_usage_time
    ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/core_usage_time }
    | union
    | rate
    | every 1m
    | align next_older(2m) }
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| join
| sub
| top 5

fetch k8s_node
| { metric kubernetes.io/node/cpu/total_cores
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/total_cores }
| union
| align next_older(2m)
| every 2m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| top 5

fetch k8s_node
| { metric kubernetes.io/node/cpu/allocatable_cores
  ; metric kubernetes.io/anthos/node/cpu/allocatable_cores }
| union
| align next_older(2m)
| every 2m
| group_by [resource.location, resource.cluster_name], .sum()
| map
    update[
      resource.cluster_name: re_extract(resource.cluster_name, '(?:.+/|^)(.+)')]
| top 5
